entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Snow beginning late this afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow ending after midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 late this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 30%
